questions.question_text: Satsangmā ling-bhedthī ____________ na ja samajavu.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 13 is: 'Satsangmā ling-bhedthī nyūnādhikpaṇu na ja samajavu.'

questions.question_text: Which scripture contains the following quote: 'Sarva varṇanā sarva strīo tathā sarva puruṣho sadāy satsang, brahma-vidyā ane mokṣhanā adhikārī chhe.'?
questions.explanation: This quote is the translation of Satsang Diksha Shlok 14-16.

questions.question_text: Gṛuhasth tathā tyāgī sarve ____________ adhikārī chhe.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 17 is: 'Gṛuhasth tathā tyāgī sarve mokṣhanā adhikārī chhe.'

questions.question_text: Which scripture contains the following quote: “...jene Bhagwānnī prāpti thaī chhe ane gṛuhasthāshramī chhe to paṇ te nirguṇ kahevāy ane tyāgī hoy te paṇ nirguṇ kahevāy.”?
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 8.

questions.question_text: Akṣharbrahma gurunā yoge Swāminārāyaṇ Bhagwānno āsharo karavāthī hu dhanya chhu, pūrṇakām chhu, ____________, nirbhay ane sukhī chhu.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 19 is: 'Akṣharbrahma gurunā yoge Swāminārāyaṇ Bhagwānno āsharo karavāthī hu dhanya chhu, pūrṇakām chhu, niṣhpāp, nirbhay ane sukhī chhu.'

questions.question_text: Which scripture contains the following quote: “...amāro draḍh vishvās rākhasho ne kahīe tem karasho to tamane mahākaṣhṭ koīk āvī paḍashe tethī athavā sāt dakālī jevu paḍashe te thakī rakṣhā karashu ane koī ūgaryāno āro na hoy evu kaṣhṭ āvī paḍashe toy paṇ rakṣhā karashu.”?
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Jetalpur 5.

questions.question_text: Mumukṣhu potānā ātmānī mukti māṭe Sahajānand Shrīhari tathā ____________ swarūp guṇātīt guruno prītie karīne āsharo kare.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 20 is: 'Mumukṣhu potānā ātmānī mukti māṭe Sahajānand Shrīhari tathā Akṣharbrahma swarūp guṇātīt guruno prītie karīne āsharo kare.'

questions.question_text: Which scripture contains the following quote: “māyā taravāno upāy e chhe je, jyāre sarva karma ane māyā teno nāsh karanārā ne māyāthī par je sākṣhātkār Shrī Puruṣhottam Bhagwān athavā te Bhagwānnā maḷel sant temanī jīvne prāpti jyāre thāy chhe tyāre temanā āshraythī māyā ullanghāy chhe.”?
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Jetalpur 1.

questions.question_text: Satsangano āsharo karī sadāy kanthane vishe ____________ mālā dhāran karvī tathā satsanganā niyamo dhāran karvā.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 21 is: 'Satsangano āsharo karī sadāy kanthane vishe kāshthnī bevdī mālā dhāran karvī tathā satsanganā niyamo dhāran karvā.'

questions.question_text: Which scripture contains the following quote: “Āvī Bhagwatswarūp sambandhī je vārtā te to shāstramāthī paṇ potānī meḷe samajāy nahī; ane sadgranthomā āvī vārtā to hoy, paṇ jyāre satpuruṣh pragaṭ thāy chhe tyāre temnā mukh thakī ja vāt samajāymā āve chhe, paṇ potānī buddhi-baḷe karīne sadgranthomāthī paṇ samajātī nathī.”?
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 13.

questions.question_text: Sarve’rhā brahmavidyāyām nāryash-____________ narās-tathā ॥ 12 ॥
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 12 is: 'Sarve’rhā brahmavidyāyām nāryash-chaiva narās-tathā ॥ 12 ॥'

questions.question_text: Which scripture contains the following quote: “...gṛuhī-tyāgīno kāī meḷ nathī, jenī samajaṇ moṭī tene ja sauthī moṭo haribhakta jāṇavo.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Vartal 20.

questions.question_text: Atishay je Moṭā Puruṣh hoy teno je upar rājīpo thāy tenā game tevā ____________ hoy to nāsh pāme.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 58 is: 'Atishay je Moṭā Puruṣh hoy teno je upar rājīpo thāy tenā game tevā malin sanskār hoy to nāsh pāme'.

questions.question_text: Which scripture contains the following quote: “Bhagwān ane Moṭā Sādhune āshare karīne to vādaḷ jevā dukh āvavānā hoy te paṇ ṭaḷī jāy ne sādhan karīne to kūṭī kūṭīne marī jāy to paṇ na ṭaḷe.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Swamini Vato 1/114.

questions.question_text: Ā sansārmā brahmasvarūp guru vinā jīvanmā ____________ tattve karīne sākshātkār na thaī shake.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 22 is: 'Ā sansārmā brahmasvarūp guru vinā jīvanmā brahmavidyāno tattve karīne sākshātkār na thaī shake.'

questions.question_text: Which scripture contains the following quote: 'Na nyūnā’dhikatā kāryā varṇā’dhāreṇa karhichit.'?
questions.explanation: This quote is the first line of Satsang Diksha Shlok 15.

questions.question_text: Swāminārāyaṇe’nanya-dṛuḍha-parama-bhaktaye । Gṛuhītvā’shraya-dīkṣhāyā ____________ satsangam āpnuyāt ॥ 18 ॥
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Satsang Diksha Shlok 18 is: 'Swāminārāyaṇe’nanya-dṛuḍha-parama-bhaktaye । Gṛuhītvā’shraya-dīkṣhāyā mantram satsangam āpnuyāt ॥ 18 ॥'

questions.question_text: Which scripture contains the following quote: “jene pratyakṣh pramāṇ draḍh āsharo hoy tene manmā evī bīk na rākhavī je, ‘Hu rakhe marīne bhūt-pret thau ke rakhe Indralokne ja pāmu ke rakhe Brahmalokne ja pāmu!’ Evī āshankā manmā rākhavī nahī; kem je, je evo Bhagwānno bhakta hoy te to Bhagwānnā dhāmne ja pāme paṇ vachmā kyāy tene Bhagwān rahevā de nahī.”
questions.explanation: This quote is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 7.

questions.question_text: Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sant e ja ____________ chhe.
questions.explanation: The exact quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 59 is: 'Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sant e ja kalyāṇkārī chhe.'

questions.question_text: Which scripture contains the following quote: 'Sant kṛupāe sadmati jāge, sant kṛupāthī sadguṇ;'?
questions.explanation: This quote is from Bhaktachintamani.
